LocaleSpan(java.util.Locale).Description: Creates a @B_android#text#style#LocaleSpan_E@ from a well-formed @B_java#util#Locale_E@. Note that only @B_java#util#Locale_E@ objects that can be created by @B_java#util#Locale#forLanguageTag_E@ are supported. @B_java#util#Locale_E@ object that cannot be created by @B_java#util#Locale#forLanguageTag_E@. new Locale(" a ", " b c", " d") is an example of such a malformed @B_java#util#Locale_E@ object.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

Returns: The entire list of locales that are associated with this span. This value will never be null.
The @B_java#util#Locale_E@ for this span. If multiple locales are associated with this span, only the first locale is returned. null if no @B_java#util#Locale_E@ is specified.
